fields.Title of Presentation: Heightening Language and Dramatic Tension in Storytelling
fields.Conference Location: The Water Cooler, 14th and Idaho, Boise
fields.Description/Abstract: The pitch: Stories ask readers to invest energy and emotion in these questions: What does this character want? How is she going to get it? What stands in his way? What are the consequences—of failure or success? In this workshop, we explore the tools of narrative structure and voice that insist your readers care about the answers.
